synopsis.text: In his kindergarten years, Ryo Takatsuki's arm was severely injured in an accident, leaving it miraculously saved by doctors. As he matures into a young adult, his life begins to unfold in peculiar ways, with his arm at the epicenter of these strange occurrences. Unbeknownst to him, his arm houses extraordinary nanomachines, the result of a clandestine experiment conducted by a powerful organization. Alongside his childhood friend Katsumi, and new classmates Hayato Shingu and Takeshi Tomoe, Ryo embarks on a quest to decipher the enigma surrounding the elusive "A.R.M.S." that has already reshaped his life. As they delve deeper, they must confront the very organization that seeks to harness the formidable power within him. Prepare for a thrilling adventure as Ryo and his friends unravel the truth behind the mysterious force that altered their lives forever.
